snippet.title: Immortals of Aveum – Gameplay First Look Trailer
snippet.description:
Summon your power, stop the Everwar, save the realms. 

Master your magic in IMMORTALS OF AVEUM™ and experience fast, fluid, first person spell-based combat, where magic is at the core of both offense and defense. Players can creatively leverage all three forces of magic and are rewarded for clever chained attacks and well-timed counters.

Unlock and upgrade a wide variety of Spells and Talents across three colors of magic. Discover, upgrade, and craft hundreds of pieces of magical gear. Then synergize your playstyle across all three forces of magic and become Aveum’s most powerful Triarch Magnus.

Pre-order Immortals of Aveum for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Steam, Epic, and EA App: https://www.ea.com/games/immortals-of-aveum/immortals-of-aveum/buy 

Made by the creators of Call of Duty and Dead Space, Immortals of Aveum is set in an original fantasy universe engulfed in magic, rife with conflict, and on the verge of oblivion. 

Ascendant Studios is an independent team of veteran developers with BAFTA and Game of the Year award-winning experience, and EA Originals will release the studio’s debut title. 

Learn more about Ascendant Studios and Immortals of Aveum: www.ascendantstudios.com 

Follow Immortals of Aveum on:
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/@ImmortalsAveum 
Twitter - https://twitter.com/ImmortalsAveum  
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ImmortalsAveum 

Follow Ascendant Studios on:
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLriT0KpGHplTdSBKHlXiIQ  
Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/ascendantstudio   
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@AscendantStudios  
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ascendant_studios  
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/ascendantstudios  
LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/ascendantstudios  

#ImmortalsOfAveum #AscendantStudios #EAOriginals

EA Originals is a place where untold stories, unheard voices, and unseen worlds are discovered. To discover more, visit www.ea.com/ea-originals.
